product_name: Black Diamond Modernist Rock Shorts - Men's
long_description: Sunny afternoons of climbing can quickly give way to hanging with friends in town, and the Black Diamond Modernist Rock Shorts with Schoeller(R) soft-shell fabric make for a seamless transition. Schoeller(R) stretch-woven soft-shell fabric with NanoSphere(R) technology resists moisture, dirt and stains to keep the pants dry and looking good. Climbing-specific gusset allows excellent range of motion. 2-way zippered fly is easy to access with a climbing harness on. 2 front hand pockets, 2 rear pockets plus a smartphone-friendly pocket.
short_description: Sunny afternoons of climbing can quickly give way to hanging with friends in town, and the Black Diamond Modernist Rock Shorts with Schoeller(R) soft-shell fabric make for a seamless transition.
